title: Airbnb Market & Pricing Analysis
summary: Tableau dashboards analyzing pricing, demand clustering, and listing distribution for Airbnb properties across neighborhoods.
process: Prepared datasets by cleaning inconsistent location & pricing values
Handled outliers and built realistic price ranges for accurate insights
Created interactive geo-maps showing hotspots and price distribution
Developed filters for neighborhood, price range, and room type
Synthesized insights around supply, demand, and pricing behavior
impact: Helped stakeholders understand neighborhood-level demand and revenue patterns
Identified listing types with best value vs. occupancy potential
Showcased geospatial visualization expertise and interactive dashboard design
